Detailed Description

A binary sampling activation function. Implements ActivationFunction interface. This is an special activation function that works on stochastic graphical models as Restricted Boltzmann Machines.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Member Function Documentation

void ANN::BinarySamplingActivationFunction::applyActivation ( FloatGPUMirroredMemoryBlock *  units,
unsigned int  units_size,
const ANNConfiguration &  conf,
bool  use_cuda 
)
virtual

Abstract method that activates a "bunch" of units (or neurons).

Abstract method that takes the input neuron potentials and computes the activation:

being the activation of neuron , depending on its potential and the other neurons potentials.

Parameters
unitsan input matrix of size (size X conf.cur_bunch_size). It is stored at an FloatGPUMirroredMemoryBlock object, Each component is a neuron activation.
units_sizethe number of neurons.
confa reference to an ANNConfiguration struct which contains global parameters as: current bunch size, maximum bunch size, use_cuda global flag,
use_cudaa boolean parameter that indicates the use of CPU computation or GPU computation (using CUDA). Overrides the configuration stored at conf parameter.

Implements ANN::ActivationFunction.

References ANNConfiguration::cur_bunch_size, ERROR_PRINT, GPUMirroredMemoryBlock< T >::getPPALForReadAndWrite(), ANNConfiguration::max_bunch_size, ANN::StochasticActivationFunction::sampleOne(), and sigmoid.

ActivationFunction * ANN::BinarySamplingActivationFunction::clone ( )
virtual

Returns a deep copy of the object.

Implements ANN::ActivationFunction.

References BinarySamplingActivationFunction(), IncRef, and ANN::StochasticActivationFunction::the_rand.

void ANN::BinarySamplingActivationFunction::randomize ( FloatGPUMirroredMemoryBlock *  units,
unsigned int  size,
const ANNConfiguration &  conf,
bool  use_cuda 
)
virtual

An abstract method for apply the stochastic process over all neurons.

Parameters
unitsa memory matrix of size (size X bunch_size), represented in a FloatGPUMirroredMemoryBlock object. Its values are the neuron probabilities of being 1.0.
sizean unsigned int parameter indicating the number of neurons on the corresponding layer.
bunch_sizean unsigned int parameter indicating the number of layers. Each layer is composed by size neurons, and each layer comes from the computation of the forward of a different input pattern.
use_cudaa boolean parameter to switch between CPU computation or GPU computation (using CUDA).

Implements ANN::StochasticActivationFunction.

References ANNConfiguration::cur_bunch_size, GPUMirroredMemoryBlock< T >::getPPALForReadAndWrite(), ANNConfiguration::max_bunch_size, MTRand::rand(), and ANN::StochasticActivationFunction::the_rand.
